DOC.brief_summary: Purpose of the study is to investigate and quantify known and possible new riskfactors for nosocomiel infection and death in the intensive care setting. As new riskfactors Mannose Binding Lechtin and Procalcitonin are chosen and compared to established riskfactors.
DOC.brief_title: Infection Surveillance in Intensive Care Patients
DOC.criteria: Admission to ICU Absence of informed consent and age less than 18 years
